name: 5391dda4-bb12-5da7-b479-eba4cb28d2d7
notes: This service provides filter absorption photometer measurements of volume absorption coefficient in air due to dried aerosol particles observed at Bösel, Germany (20110101 - 20120411). The observations contain level 2 data. The time resolution is 1h. The observations are stored in the EBAS database (http://ebas.nilu.no/).
title: Measurements of volume absorption coefficient in air due to dried aerosol particles at Bösel, Germany (20110101 - 20120411)
